sentences.en: a building with balconies projecting out over the street
sentences.cn: 阳台伸出到街上的楼房

sentences.en: a geography project
sentences.cn: 一个地理课题

sentences.en: a project manager
sentences.cn: 项目经理

sentences.en: A series of setbacks have put the whole project in jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 一系列的挫折使整个项目面临失败。

sentences.en: a three-year research project
sentences.cn: 一项为期三年的研究计划

sentences.en: Bradley projects a natural warmth and sincerity.
sentences.cn: 布拉德利表现出一种自然的热情和真诚。

sentences.en: His objective was to kill the space station project altogether.
sentences.cn: 他的目的是使空间站项目全面停止。

sentences.en: His project is concerned with applying the technology to practical business problems.
sentences.cn: 他的项目是将这项技术应用于实际的商务问题。

sentences.en: It is questionable whether the expenditure on this project is really justified.
sentences.cn: 该项目的开支是否真的合理还未可知。

sentences.en: Madonna backed out of the project after much wrangling.
sentences.cn: 多番争吵之后，麦当娜退出了这个项目。

sentences.en: projected sales figures
sentences.cn: 预计的销售数字

sentences.en: projecting teeth
sentences.cn: 龅牙

sentences.en: She projected the slide onto the wall.
sentences.cn: 她将幻灯片投射到墙上。

sentences.en: Speed was of the essence in a project of this type.
sentences.cn: 对于这种项目来说，速度至关重要。

sentences.en: The Ariane space-rocket project has had a shining success.
sentences.cn: 阿里安航天火箭项目取得了辉煌的成功。

sentences.en: The banks have the power to pull the plug on the project.
sentences.cn: 银行有能力让该工程终止。

sentences.en: The Channel Tunnel project is the biggest civil engineering project in Europe.
sentences.cn: 英吉利海峡隧道是欧洲最大的土木工程。

sentences.en: The company projected an annual growth rate of 3%.
sentences.cn: 该公司预计每年的增长率为3%。

sentences.en: The main investor in the project is the French bank Credit National.
sentences.cn: 该项目的主要投资商是法国的国民信贷银行。

sentences.en: The project aims to provide an analysis of children’s emotions.
sentences.cn: 该计划旨在对儿童情绪作出分析。

sentences.en: The project evaporated and Harry was left high and dry.
sentences.cn: 那个项目逐渐叫停，哈里陷入了困境。

sentences.en: The project has gone through nearly a dozen years of planning.
sentences.cn: 该项目已历经近12年的规划。

sentences.en: The project is funded by Wellcome plc.
sentences.cn: 这个项目由威康公司资助。

sentences.en: The project is taking a long time but is now nearing completion.
sentences.cn: 这个项目耗时很长，但现在就快结束了。

sentences.en: the projected closure of the hospital
sentences.cn: 计划关闭这所医院

sentences.en: The scheme will now be extended after a successful pilot project (= a small trial to test if an idea will be successful ) .
sentences.cn: 试行成功后，该方案现在将得到推广。

sentences.en: The State Water Project has shut off all supplies to farmers.
sentences.cn: 州水利工程项目已切断了对农场主的所有供水。

sentences.en: The team tried projecting the maps with two different projectors onto the same screen.
sentences.cn: 该组尝试用两台不同的放映机将地图投映在同一屏幕上。

sentences.en: The total cost of the project would be more than $240 million.
sentences.cn: 该项目的总成本会超过2.4亿美元。

words.tran_cn: 投射；规划；突出；发射；推测
放映员；电视技师；地图绘制员；电影放映师
[仪] 投影仪；放映机；探照灯；设计者
使突出（project的现在分词）；计划；发射

phrases.tran_cn: 建筑计划，建设项目；基建计划
重点项目，关键项目；枢纽工程
试点项目，试点工程；样板工程，样板设计
工程项目成本；施工费用
项目融资；项目资金筹措
n. 项目规划；工程计划
项目规划；工程规划；计划图编制

trans.tran_cn: 项目，工程，（学生的）课题，研究项目，方案，计划
trans.tran_en: a carefully planned piece of work to get information about something, to build something, to improve something etc

trans.tran_cn: 规划，计划，预测，放映，投射，伸出；凸出，表现，展现
trans.tran_en: to make the picture of a film, photograph etc appear in a larger form on a screen or flat surface
to stick out beyond an edge or surface

trans.tran_cn: 投掷，发射；放映；设计，规划；突出，使凸出，使伸出
trans.tran_en: to stick out beyond an edge or surface
